name: U.S. Bureau of Land Management (BLM). 2009a. Red Cliff Mine Draft Environmental Impact Statement, Appendix H: Air Quality Analysis Modeling Report
description:
DESCRIPTION
Production rate and lifetime of mine on PDF page 8, highlighted text. Expected period of time for mine commissioning, PDF page 43. Fuel consumption and emissions data, PDF page 47.

FULL CITATION
U.S. Bureau of Land Management. 2009. Red Cliff Mine Draft Environmental Impact Statement, Appendix H: Air Quality Analysis Modeling Report. U.S. Department of the Interior. http://www.blm.gov/pgdata/etc/medialib/blm/co/programs/land_use_planning/rmp/red_cliff_mine/documents/draft_eis/volume_ii.Par.22224.File.dat/Appendix_H_Air_Quality_Analysis_Modeling_Report.pdf (Accessed December 11, 2009).
